explanation: Use this route to end the user's current session. This route will invalidate the user's authentication token. You must pass in uid, client, and access-token in the request headers.

requests.curl:
curl "http://remindux.herokuapp.com/auth/sign_out" -d '' -X DELETE \
	-H "Accept: application/json" \
	-H "Content-Type: application/json" \
	-H "Access-Token: kiuF9hv0eXdbKDBv_8JJcA" \
	-H "Token-Type: Bearer" \
	-H "Client: oMUKM2VP3zlIr7s-QVTVwA" \
	-H "Expiry: 1487037925" \
	-H "Uid: meghan.bailey@keeling.biz"
